inclusion.criterion: Disease status: patients with hepatitis C Virus related liver cirrhosis child A& B (scores 5-9)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Previous treatment: treatment naïve and treatment experienced
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: HCV RNA: Negative at any point between 12-24 weeks post treatment to confirm successful eradication of the virus
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: HCV coinfection with HBV or HIV
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with high risk of infection (I.V drug users, patients with blood disease requiring blood transfusion)
exclusion.label: not_met
